product_details.name: Vibrant Sound Pro™ - Premium Wireless Headphones with Rainbow Fashion Design
product_details.description:
• Eye-catching rainbow color design with stylish metallic accents
• Comfortable over-ear cushions for extended listening sessions
• Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity for hassle-free music enjoyment
• Built-in high-quality microphone for crystal-clear calls
• Foldable and portable design perfect for travel
• Up to 20 hours of battery life on a single charge
• Compatible with all smartphones, tablets, and computers
• Adjustable headband for perfect fit
• Premium sound quality with deep bass and clear highs
• Includes carrying case and charging cable
• Perfect for music lovers, gamers, and fashion-conscious users
• 1-year manufacturer warranty

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a lively and energetic layout suited for modern tech products. The background uses a rich diagonal gradient transitioning smoothly from vibrant pink to deep purple and blue, which provides a bold, youthful appearance. The central focus is a circular frame that contains the main product image (`product_image`), bordered by a white and dotted ring to make the image stand out.

At the top, the prominent heading (`heading`) in bold white uppercase typography grabs attention, while the slightly italic subheading (`subheading`) adds a premium and stylish contrast. To the right, a circular price tag (`price`) stands out in hot pink with white text, strategically placed for quick visibility.

Near the bottom, a short features list (`description`) in clean, uppercase text highlights major selling points. This section uses white text and circular bullet points for emphasis. The vibrant call-to-action (`cta`) is displayed within a hot pink rectangular button (`cta_background`), inviting users to shop.

Decorative elements such as linear and circular vector graphics enhance the banner’s dynamic appeal without overwhelming the design.

**Color Palette**:
- Gradient Pink: #FF3E9D
- Purple: #7B5EEA
- Blue: #0099FF
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Pink (Price bubble): #FF3E9D
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, youthful color palette that combines warm and cool tones harmoniously. Prominent colors include the mustard yellow top (#D48C33), classic denim blue jacket (#336699), and the fuchsia-purple headband (#A03D87). These primary hues contrast beautifully, with the yellow reflecting warmth and energy, while the cool denim tones bring balance and structure. The headband and reflective sunglasses (#F2D94E) highlight fun and vibrance, enhanced by the neutral black pants (#2C2C2C) grounding the look. The colors are well-blended through strategic layering—warm tones pop against cool ones, making each element stand out while maintaining unity.
